articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Halifax, Nova Scotia

9:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will make an announcement on youth employment and hold a media availability.

Common Good Solutions
5557 Cunard Street

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage
  • Media are asked to arrive no later than 8:45 a.m.
